hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select distinct EOGP.CREATOR, EOGP.CREATE_TIME, EOGP.MODIFIER, EOGP.MODIFY_TIME, EOGP.REC_VER, EOGP.REC_STATUS, EOGP.ORG_ID, EOGP.PM_CODE, EOGP.EOGP_ID, EOGP.EOGP_CDOE, EOGP.EOGP_NAME_CN, EOGP.EOGP_NAME_EN, EOGP.EOGP_REMARK, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_CREATOR_NAME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_MODIFIER_NAME, EOGP.TIME_ZONE from EO_WAYBILL_GROUP_POLICY EOGP left join EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_POLICY EOCP ON EOGP.PM_CODE = EOCP.EOCP_EOGP_PM_CODE LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EOGP.CREATOR = ESUS.ESUS_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EOGP.MODIFIER = ESUSM.ESUS_ID where 1=1 << and EOGP.ORG_ID = :orgId>> << and EOCP.Eocp_Name like :eocpName /*子策略名称*/>> << and EOGP.EOGP_CDOE = :eogpCdoe >> << and EOGP.EOGP_NAME_CN like :eogpNameCn >> << and EOGP.EOGP_NAME_EN like :eogpNameEn >> << and EOGP.EOGP_REMARK = :eogpRemark >> << and EOGP.REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> order by EOGP.MODIFY_TIME desc
